author: Staff Reporter
text: S. Muthulakshmi (43) of Rajivnaickan Palayam was killed when a speeding truck hit the two-wheeler on which she and her husband Shanmugham was travelling on the Thadagam Road on Tuesday. The couple was returning after attending a temple festival at 24 Veerapandi village. She died instantaneously. Shanmugham has been admitted to a hospital. Agitated people blocked Thadagam road and damaged the truck.
title: Woman killed
